body:
Hey guys, today I just uploaded the first part of a two part 1v1v1 walls match with Vladthegreat100 and Thecreator809!
This is just the build phase, but make sure to watch it all because I cut out the really boring parts to keep it entertaining the whole way through!

*Please note that I am not advertising Vlad's server. He downloaded this map very quickly and we played on it just for fun. There is no IP given, and the server is not even ready yet. This was just for a quick fun match, and I have no intention of advertising his server.*

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=56sD1D9TdLE

Enjoy everyone!
-Porky.

title: 1v1v1 Walls With Vlad and Thecreator809!

replies.body: I watched it at 4am ._. good video.
